title: Trek Madone SL 7 Gen 7 bike review: IsoFlow + burrito is a perfect match
content:
The Trek Madone SL Gen 7 now completes the line matching the more expensive SLR and offers almost the same ride quality.

Read the full article at Trek Madone SL 7 Gen 7 bike review: IsoFlow + burrito is a perfect match on Velo.
author: Troy Templin
